name: Americano w/ Creme
description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of cream culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich and full of flavor, our hot chocolate combines dark chocolate and steamed milk for a warm, sweet treat

name: Cappuccino
description: Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick milk foam. An alchemy of barista artistry and craft

name: Caffe macchiato
description: The macchiato is an espresso coffee drink, topped with a small amount of foamed or steamed milk to allow the taste of the espresso to still shine through.

name: Latte
description: Rich, full-bodied espresso in steamed milk, lightly topped with foam

name: Filter Coffee
description: Hot water through ground coffee beans and a filter to separate the coffee grounds from the liquid
